title: Trump’s Shrinkage, How Italians Stay Handsy In Covid 6.3.21
itunes:title: Trump’s Shrinkage, How Italians Stay Handsy In Covid 6.3.21
description:
In episode 922, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Pod Yourself A Gun co-host Matt Lieb to discuss Trump's blog, the remains of children buried a former B.C. residential school in Canada, Fauci's leaked emails, the future of European kissing and hugging, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump blog page shuts down for good
  2. Remains of 215 children found buried at former B.C. residential school, First Nation says
  3. Pressure mounts for Pope to apologize for church’s role in residential schools
  4. ‘Disgrace’: Indigenous leaders blast Catholic Church for silence on residential schools
  5. Canada-wide search urged as children's remains found
  6. Sir John A. Macdonald statue quickly removed after Charlottetown council decision
  7. Calls grow to rename Ryerson institutions across Ontario
  8. Indian Residential Schools Settlement Agreement
  9. NDP criticizes government after family of residential school survivor denied compensation
  10. Ottawa spent $2.3M on court battles with St. Anne's residential school survivors
  11. Government preventing full truth on residential schools to surface: commission
  12. It’s time to bring our children home from the residential schools
  13. Separating children from their parents, the Canadian way
  14. Trudeau government appeals ruling on compensation to First Nations children
  15. Statement from MPP Sol Mamakwa on Kamloops Residential School
  16. Anthony Fauci’s pandemic emails: ‘All is well despite some crazy people in this world’
  17. How Will Europeans Kiss in a Post-Pandemic World?
  18. LISTEN: Seu Jorge And Almaz - The Model (Kraftwerk)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
